text: hi everyone is Helen here today at we
making chicken sticky rice so yeah but
it's a very special version from Danone
and I use this a lot
like every day when I was in secondary
school in high school it might not be
similar to the version as you try before
but I'm sure you will like this one so
let's begin
firstly we wash the glutinous rice for
at least two times and then soak it in
water for at least one hour after that
drain off the excess water and you will
see that the rice has flow a lot bigger
add in half a teaspoon of salt and a
quarter teaspoon of turmeric powder to
give it a nice yellow color later then
toss well then add in water just enough
to barely cover the rice the ratio a 1
to 2 that means you only need 1 cup of
water for 2 cups of rice then cook in
the rice cooker as normal when the rice
cooker has finished his job you can use
chopstick to stir up the sticky rice
sometimes some of the rice isn't cooked
completely yet in that case you can use
a piece of parchment paper or plastic
wrap and cover the rice and cook one
more time
next we slide one onion very thinly and
soak it in a bowl of very cold water to
remove the strong onion smell it also
help to make the onion more crunchy for
spring onions detach the white and green
parts in a saucepan adding about 2 to 3
tbsp of vegetable oil then add in the
white part of spring onion first we are
making scallion ire but we're going to
keep the spring onion as the whole and
not chop them up so we fry the spring
onion stem for around 30 seconds and
then add in the green part and turn off
the heat gently stir it when the oil is
too hot
next we're going to make a very simple
chicken salad we're gonna need a
shredded chicken you can boil a chicken
breast and shred it by hands or I'll
cook the whole chicken and shred it now
we're ready in my chicken congee video
season the shredded chicken to your
taste with salt and pepper mix well and
add in Vietnamese mint roya
the tinglies light onion which I have
brain of the SS
miss really well and your chicken salad
is ready in central Vietnam this is a
very popular way to prepare chicken
salad - for offerings and special events
so when the sticky rice is cooked you
transfer a small portion onto a plate
fresh scores top it up with a chicken
salad and then garnish with a few stems
of the scallion oil I look how good that
is you can sell this with some sweet
chili sauce and maybe a little bit more
salt and pepper to your taste that's it
the simple breakfast that I've had for
so many years and making it now really
bring back memories so I hope you enjoy
it
